title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; install via pip install ollama.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; npm install ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package for Ollama models; pip install langchain-ollama.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (formerly Ollama-WebUI); docker-compose ready.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper for Ollama with conversation history and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & PVC support.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that exposes Ollama models to servers with slash commands.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim client library for Ollama; nimble install ollama.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module for CI pipelines that spin up Ollama containers and run model tests.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot server for Ollama with Socket-mode and granular ACLs.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator & OllamaEmbedder nodes.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with strongly-typed models and IAsyncEnumerable streaming.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate offering async/await bindings to Ollama’s REST API.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app that proxies to Ollama with token-level streaming.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for local AI autocomplete using Ollama.

title: ollama-mcp
summary: Model Context Protocol server exposing Ollama as a tool for Claude Desktop & friends.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform module to provision GPU-enabled EC2 instances with Ollama pre-installed.
